Name: Activate NumLock
Description: Automatically activates NumLock on user login

Name: Add Winget App
Description: Install applications using Windows Package Manager (Winget)

Name: Automatic Timezone
Description: Enables automatic timezone detection and configuration

Name: Block AAD Workplace Join
Description: Prevents unauthorized Azure AD workplace join on devices

Name: Change Multiple Registry Keys
Description: Template for modifying multiple registry keys at once

Name: Change Registry Key (Generic)
Description: Generic template for registry key modifications

Name: Check PNP Devices
Description: Detects and reports Plug and Play device issues

Name: Clear DNS Cache
Description: Clears the DNS resolver cache to fix connectivity issues

Name: Clear Download Folder
Description: Removes files from the Downloads folder to free up space

Name: Clear Outlook Cache
Description: Clears Microsoft Outlook cache to resolve performance issues

Name: Clear Teams Cache
Description: Clears Microsoft Teams cache to resolve app issues

Name: Create Local Admin
Description: Creates a local administrator account on the device

Name: Create Local Admin (LAPS)
Description: Creates local admin with Local Administrator Password Solution integration

Name: Delete Local Admin
Description: Removes specified local administrator account

Name: Detect SCCM
Description: Detects and optionally removes SCCM client for Intune migration

Name: Device Auto-Syncer
Description: Ensures OneDrive Known Folders are automatically syncing

Name: Disable Co-Installer
Description: Disables device co-installers for enhanced security

Name: Disable Fast Boot
Description: Disables Windows Fast Boot to resolve driver issues

Name: Disable SMBv1
Description: Disables insecure SMB version 1 protocol

Name: Disable Start Menu Web Search
Description: Disables web search in Windows Start Menu

Name: Disk Repair
Description: Runs CHKDSK to detect and repair disk errors

Name: Enable Delivery Optimization Logging
Description: Enables verbose logging for Windows Delivery Optimization

Name: Enable .NET 3.5
Description: Installs and enables .NET Framework 3.5

Name: Enable RDP
Description: Enables Remote Desktop Protocol on the device

Name: Enable Signature Validation
Description: Enables Windows Defender signature validation

Name: Enforce SMB Signing
Description: Enforces SMB packet signing for secure file sharing

Name: Fortinet VPN Profile
Description: Configures Fortinet VPN connection profile

Name: Get Adobe DC Java Settings
Description: Checks and configures Java settings in Adobe Acrobat DC

Name: Get Adobe Reader Java Settings
Description: Checks and configures Java settings in Adobe Reader

Name: Get Adobe Reader Flash Settings
Description: Disables Flash content in Adobe Reader

Name: Check Always Elevated
Description: Detects and remediates AlwaysInstallElevated vulnerability

Name: BitLocker Recovery Key
Description: Backs up BitLocker recovery keys to Azure AD

Name: Disk Cleanup
Description: Runs Windows Disk Cleanup to free up space

Name: Cloud Delivered Protection
Description: Enables Windows Defender cloud-delivered protection

Name: Get Connected Devices
Description: Reports all connected devices (USB, Bluetooth, etc.)

Name: Device Uptime Check & Reboot
Description: Checks device uptime and reboots if exceeds 7 days

Name: LSA Protection
Description: Enables Local Security Authority (LSA) protection

Name: Network Protection
Description: Enables Windows Defender Network Protection

Name: Office Telemetry
Description: Configures Microsoft Office telemetry settings

Name: PUA Protection
Description: Enables Windows Defender Potentially Unwanted Application protection

Name: Real-Time Behavior Monitoring
Description: Enables Windows Defender real-time behavior monitoring

Name: Real-Time Protection
Description: Enables Windows Defender real-time protection

Name: Set Timezone (W. Europe)
Description: Sets timezone to Western Europe Standard Time

Name: Windows Hello Enrolled Methods
Description: Reports Windows Hello for Business enrollment methods

Name: Windows Hello Last Used Method
Description: Reports the last Windows Hello authentication method used

Name: Install CMTrace
Description: Installs CMTrace log viewer utility

Name: Clear Recycle Bin
Description: Empties the Recycle Bin to free up disk space

Name: Logoff Current User
Description: Logs off the currently signed-in user

Name: Invoke Shutdown
Description: Initiates a graceful system shutdown

Name: Install Teams
Description: Installs Microsoft Teams application

Name: Reinstall Teams
Description: Uninstalls and reinstalls Microsoft Teams

Name: Run Speed Test
Description: Performs network speed test and reports results

Name: OneDrive Folder Always Offline
Description: Sets OneDrive folders to always available offline

Name: Profile Backup
Description: Backs up user profile data

Name: Profile Cleanup
Description: Removes old and unused user profiles

Name: Remove Teams Chat
Description: Removes consumer Teams Chat from Windows 11

Name: Remove Consumer Apps
Description: Removes pre-installed consumer applications

Name: Remove Proxy Settings
Description: Removes proxy server configuration

Name: Reset Windows Update
Description: Resets Windows Update components to fix update issues

Name: Reset Software Distribution Folder
Description: Clears the Windows Update cache folder

Name: Restart Service (Generic)
Description: Template for restarting Windows services

Name: Restart Windows Search Service
Description: Restarts the Windows Search service to fix indexing issues

Name: Restart Windows Update Service
Description: Restarts Windows Update service to resolve update issues

Name: Run Browser Connection Test
Description: Tests browser connectivity to common websites

Name: Set Cached Logon Count to 0
Description: Sets cached domain credentials count to zero

Name: Set Canary Token Registry Key
Description: Creates a registry-based canary token for intrusion detection

Name: Set Service (Generic)
Description: Template for configuring Windows service startup type

Name: Test LAPS User
Description: Verifies LAPS managed local admin account exists

Name: Toast Reboot Message
Description: Displays a toast notification prompting user to reboot

Name: Uninstall Application
Description: Generic template for uninstalling applications

Name: Uninstall Visual C++ 2010
Description: Removes Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable

Name: Uninstall Dell SupportAssist
Description: Removes Dell SupportAssist application

Name: Uninstall Private Teams
Description: Removes consumer/private Microsoft Teams installations

Name: Uninstall UserChrome
Description: Removes custom Firefox userChrome.css modifications

Name: Unpin Microsoft Store
Description: Removes Microsoft Store from taskbar

Name: Update Chocolatey Apps
Description: Updates all applications managed by Chocolatey

Name: Winget Install Apps from URL
Description: Installs applications from a URL list using Winget

Name: Winget Uninstall Apps from URL
Description: Uninstalls applications from a URL list using Winget

Name: Winget Update All
Description: Updates all applications managed by Windows Package Manager

Name: Auto Remove Proactive Remediation
Description: Automatically removes proactive remediation scripts from devices

Name: Block Keyboard Shortcuts
Description: Prevents specific keyboard shortcuts from being used

Name: Collect Lenovo BIOS Settings (Log Analytics v1)
Description: Collects Lenovo BIOS settings and sends to Log Analytics workspace version 1
DetectionScript: Collect Lenovo BIOS settings in Log Analytics\Detection_LogAnalyticsv1.ps1

Name: Collect Lenovo BIOS Settings (Log Analytics v2)
Description: Collects Lenovo BIOS settings and sends to Log Analytics workspace version 2
DetectionScript: Collect Lenovo BIOS settings in Log Analytics\Detection_LogAnalyticsv2.ps1

Name: Compare Lenovo BIOS Version
Description: Compares current BIOS version with latest available version

Name: Detect BSOD and Send Logs
Description: Detects Blue Screen of Death events and sends logs for analysis

Name: Detect Driver Issues
Description: Identifies problematic or missing device drivers

Name: Export Proactive Remediation to CSV
Description: Exports proactive remediation script results to CSV file

Name: Low Disk Space Notification
Description: Alerts users when disk space is running low

Name: Reboot Warning
Description: Notifies users when a reboot is required

Name: Recycle Bin Size Alert
Description: Alerts when Recycle Bin exceeds size threshold

Name: Remediate Local Admin
Description: Manages local administrator accounts on devices

Name: CVE-2554100 Report
Description: Reports on CVE-2554100 vulnerability status

Name: Search String in Remediations
Description: Searches for specific strings within remediation scripts

Name: Set BIOS Password
Description: Sets or updates BIOS password on devices

Name: Toast Notification SYSTEM (Install Module)
Description: Displays toast notifications in SYSTEM context with module installation

Name: Toast Notification SYSTEM (No Module)
Description: Displays toast notifications in SYSTEM context without module installation
